p: End stage renal disease is a condition associated with intestinal permeability barrier injury and microbial metabolite translocation from the lumen [ 94]. Additionally, hemodialysis is associated with intradialytic hypotension and attendant loss of intestinal permeability barrier patency [ 95]. It has been reported that hemodialysis within the previous 72 h was associated with BDG false positives, p = 0.011 [ 96].
